document.full_text: a yard sale in birmingham, ala., raised $164,000 to help pay off a $2.9 billion judgment against richard scrushy, the disgraced former chief executive of healthsouth.
document.title: hunting for bargains after a titan's fall: everything must go
lines_and_colors: a yard sale in birmingham, ala., raised $164,000 to help pay off a $2.9 billion judgment against richard scrushy, the disgraced former chief executive of healthsouth.
